message: Starting investigation on realtime connection status and enhanced logging deployment
Found enhanced logging in place but commands aren't reaching database. Investigating database connectivity and command insertion path
Investigation complete: Realtime subscription hangs indefinitely at line 262. Fixer agent deployed to add timeout. Enhanced logging is properly deployed but never executes due to hang.
INVESTIGATION COMPLETE: Root cause identified and fix deployed. Realtime subscription timeout added at line 263. Main.py needs restart to apply fix.
